snippet.title: Official Call of Duty®: Ghosts Single Player Campaign Trailer
snippet.description:
Call of Duty: Ghosts takes the critically-acclaimed franchise into the next generation. New world. New story. New, next-gen engine. Pre-order now at http://www.callofduty.com/ghosts/wheretobuy

Keep up with the latest intel on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/codghosts and by following us Twitter: @CallofDuty and @InfinityWard. Visit http://www.callofduty.com/ghosts
